message.afptweaks.creative_required: You must be in creative mode to use this item.

tooltip.afptweaks.configuratormode.link_: Right-click to link a functional block, right-click again to link it to a trigger

tooltip.afptweaks.configuratormode.reset: Right-click a single-use functional block to reset it

text.afptweaks.quest.werewolf1: Can you please help me adventurer, I've been afflicted by a most terrible curse.Â¶I've been told only a Golden Apple will cure me, could you get one for me?
text.afptweaks.quest.werewolf2: Have you found a golden apple for me?
text.afptweaks.quest.werewolf3: Thank you adventurer, I feel better already.
